title: Référentiel pour les types de captures utilisé par l’Ob7 de l’IRD
lineage:
Step1 : The table public.espece was extracted from Balbaya database. The column used as species code is the column named c_esp
Step2 : The table species.code was extracted from T3_prod database. The column used as species code is the column named c_code
Step3 : The table observe_seine.speciesfate was extracted from Observe database. The column used as species code is the column named code
Step4 : The table observe_seine.targetcatch was extracted from Observe database. The column used as species code is the column named discarded
Step5 : The table observe_seine.targetsample was extracted from Observe database. The column used as species code is the column named discarded
Step6 : The table observe_longline.catchfate was extracted from Observe database. The column used as species code is the column named code
Step7 : All the tables previously collated were merged.
Step8 : Some minor adaptations (including removal of redundant codes between the code lists) were made to compose this code list.
Step9 : The code list was integrated into the Sardara database

title: Référentiel pour les espèces utilisé par l’Ob7 de l’IRD dans la base de données Balbaya
lineage:
Step1 : The table public.espece was extracted from Balbaya database.
Step2 : The code list was integrated into the Sardara database

title: Référentiel pour les espèces utilisé par l’Ob7 de l’IRD dans la base de données Observe
lineage:
Step1 : The table observe_common.species was extracted from Observe database.
Step2 : The code list was integrated into the Sardara database

title: Référentiel pour les espèces utilisé par l’Ob7 de l’IRD dans la base de données T3+
lineage:
Step1 : The table public.species was extracted from T3+ database.
Step2 : The code list was integrated into the Sardara database
